sentences.sContent: Thomas and his wife looked at each other in smug satisfaction.
sentences.sCn: 托马斯和他妻子互相看着对方，面带着自鸣得意的满足。

synos.tran: 自鸣得意的；自以为是的；整洁的
书呆子；自命不凡的家伙

remMethod.val: s + mug(杯子) → 杯子满了 → 自满的

words.tran: 自鸣得意地；沾沾自喜地

trans.tranCn: 自满的， 自命不凡的
trans.tranOther: showing too much satisfaction with your own cleverness or success – used to show disapproval
